mapper.insert: insert into qa (qa_no, user_no, qa_content, qa_title, qa_image) values (qa_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{content}, #{title}, #{image})
mapper.select: select qa_no as no, qa_content as content, qa_title as title, qa_image as image from qa order by qa_no = #{no}

select qa_no as no, user_no, qa_content as content, qa_title as title, qa_created_date as createdDate, qa_image as image, qa_answer_status as answerStatus from qa where user_no = #{value} order by qa_created_date desc

select q.qa_no as no, q.user_no, q.qa_content as content, q.qa_title as title, q.qa_created_date as createdDate, q.qa_image as image, q.qa_answer_status as answerStatus, a.qa_content as answerContent from qa q, qa_answer a where q.qa_no = #{value} and q.qa_no = a.qa_no order by q.qa_created_date desc
select qa_no as no, qa_content as content, qa_title as title, qa_created_date as createdDate, qa_image as image, qa_answer_status as answerStatus from qa where qa_no = #{value}
